title: Chris Martin Made Drunken Phone Call To Win Back Jennifer Lawrence?

meta_data.description:
Gossip Cop
Chris Martin Made Drunken Phone Call To Win Back Jennifer Lawrence?
Gossip Cop
Chris Martin did NOT make a drunken phone call to Jennifer Lawrence trying to win her back, despite a made-up tabloid report. Gossip Cop can exclusively bust this claim. We're told it's not true. The Coldplay frontman briefly dated the actress in 2014 ...
